title: Gamesearcher
author: Gamesearcher
content: Good morning,I am form italy and I am doing Matched betting for years. Matched betting aka bonus hunting, collect and make a mathematical profit from bonuses that bookmakers and casinò offer. I have always used only italian bookmakers, in Italy there are still 4-5 books with pretty good First deposit bonus with decent rollovers, for example bet365.it, snai.it, eurobet.itIn italy they almost never void your bets, and if they lock your account (for example if you find that you are multiaccount), they are forced by law to give you back the money that was in your account.I know that there are .com bookmakers with good first deposit bonus, I am looking for advices since I never used them before.Which are the most reliable? I have no problem doing KYC, in italy you are forced to do IT for every book.I am looking for decent books that don't scam you and have nice first deposit offer.I can share some info about italian bookmakers if you eventually need, thank you
